name: Endless Pain.net
description:
[THE PASSWORD OF THE WINRAR IS pain]
So this game is a SILLY LITTLE PROJECT that I do in my free time.
IT'S FAR FROM PERFECT OR EVEN A BALANCED EXPERIENCE.
Nothing too crazy.
Nothing too long.
Nothing too great or particullary fun.
The idea is an RPG roguelike in wich you get random abilities instead of levelling in a class so every run is different because you get random abilities.
The "game" is also randomized because you will find yourself in random rooms selected by pools that change after you keep scaling this "tower",you will find random items and you will fight random enemies and monsters.
I was very inspired by Lisa and I accidentaly ended up copying alot of stuff from the binding of isaac so yeah nothing too original here.

DISCLAIMER:
IT'S FREE CAUSE I USED COPYRIGHTED MUSIC AND STUFF SO NO,I CANNOT PUT A PRICE OR THEY WILL FIND ME AND KILL ME.
Maybe one day I'll not be lazy and I'll actually remove everything that is copyrighted and put stuff that is not copyrighted as a replacement.
Untill then,enjoy the free game man :)
